attributes.action: Force the government to listen to the petitions on this site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petition website is an ideal website for starting petitions and making the government aware of concerns in the country.

Unfortuately replies to petitions on this site avoids the main subject matter of the petition and relies heavily on current thinking of the population - when instead these petitions usually represent the country thoughts.

We the undersigned suggest that 10% of the top rated petitions should be highly considered to be put into law as requested. If the PM is not willing to read these petitions then this site is worthless and does not reflect well on the PM's ability to listen to the people of this country.

rejection.details: Comments on the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
